name: Kindle (drkehowler)
description:
Fight some waves of enemies in the arena, fight bats, ogres and probably more, fend them off with  Kei, your companion and your trusty wooden sword. Hope you have fun.

There are currently 7 waves to fight off! Good luck!

A short action arena game that I made using Godot, and free sprite sheets (0x72), this is the first game that I have made, hope you have fun (it's kinda hard tho). I am just a beginner coder and hopes to make my own game according to what I want. Please leave your feedbacks below, they are really appreciated, lastly, enjoy :)

I was only using the windows version hope its still the same in mac. thank youuu
